item.description:
Hello Canucks,

For February's meetup we'll be doing an outdoor activity! Since it is almost the end of the winter season I thought it would be nice to meetup and do some skating outside. We'll be going to the Kendall Square outdoor rink and afterwards we'll grab dinner and/or drinks at the Cambridge Brewing Company in Kendall Square.

It's 4 dollars for the skating and 5 dollars to rent skates if you don't have our own.

Please remember that you are skating at your own risk! Please be careful.
Kendall Square Skating

Thanks,

Andrew

About this Meetup Group
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be wearing a brown toque...

group.name: The Boston Expat Canadian Meetup Group

item.name: The Boston Expat Canadian February Meetup
